body:
Comment 2 by **wuqq123**: 
Sorry. I just download "go1.0.3 Windows (x86 32-bit) ZIP archive" in the download page,
Maybe it has been fixed. 
I think the problem caused by data align. I try these:

0) long long foo0() { return 1; }
1) long long foo1(void* p) { return 1; }
2) long long foo2(void* p, void* q) { return 1; }
3) long long foo3(void* p, void* q, void* t) { return 1; }
4) long long foo4(void* p, void* q, void* t, void *x) { return 1; }

0, 2, 4 worked. 
1, 3 returned 0x100000000.
